SELECT pa.id, album_name, album_desc, album_cover, COUNT( a.id ) AS photo_count, status FROM ( SELECT id, album_name, album_desc, album_cover, status FROM tb_photo_album WHERE is_delete = 0
and album_name like concat('%',#{condition.keywords},'%')
ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{current},#{size} ) pa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, album_id FROM tb_photo WHERE is_delete = 0 ) a ON pa.id = a.album_id GROUP BY pa.id
